title: The Best (and Worst) Ways to Clean Bird Poop From Your Patio
description:
On the beautiful, sunny days of spring, bird poop will suddenly appear on all your patio, railings, and outdoor furniture. Online, there are all kinds of suggestions for what you can use to remove the icky white stain once you’ve scraped away the solid part, but it’s not clear which ones work and which are just…

title: Add Savory Spices to Your Boring Cookies
description:
When making cookies, you are not beholden to cinnamon, chocolate, or any of the usual “baking spices.” There’s a whole cabinet of seasonings at your disposal, so get a little quirky. It’s easy to think that if your spices aren’t sweet, they’ll taste “off” in a cookie recipe. The fact is that none of them are sweet.…

title: How to Finally Lower the Ringtone Volume on Your AirPods
description:

Alas, you have no choice but to prepare your ears whenever you use your AirPods. After all, there’s no way to separately…

title: The Out-of-Touch Adults' Guide to Kid Culture: Gen Z Is Redefining Espionage
description:

title: Get Paid up to $20,000 for Finding ChatGPT Security Flaws
description:

title: Fortune Favors Those Who Add Cheese to Their Smoothies
description:

You can add any combination of fruit, veggies, dairy, or powders to make a shake that works for your palate and goals. While that’s all fine and good, there’s a bit of dairy that doesn’t get enough attention…

title: You Can Stop Hidden Windows Apps From Running on Boot Up
description:

title: Everything You Should Be Using Your Local Extension Office for (but Aren’t)
description:

title: Whether to Turn on the A/C or Roll Down the Windows, According to Science
description:
